writings.text: 勝てば官軍、負ければ賊軍
勝てば官軍負ければ賊軍

readings.text: かてばかんぐん、まければぞくぐん

furigana.writing: 勝てば官軍、負ければ賊軍
furigana.reading: かてばかんぐん、まければぞくぐん

glossary: history is written by the victors
if you win you are the loyalist army, if you lose you are the rebel army
winners are always right and losers are always in the wrong
